title: Fat Man and Little Boy (1989) The First Atomic Bombs
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0097336/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0097336/</a>

FAT MAN AND LITTLE BOY takes us inside the group of top scientists during WW2 who made the first atomic bombs. Isolated in a heavily guarded New Mexico compound, the geniuses turn the idea from ambitious concept into immense reality. 

The title is made up of the nicknames of the first two bombs, one to be used over Nagasaki, the other over Hiroshima, respectively.

Widescreen, good stereo.

DVDrip, XviD 544x304 25 fps, two-pass, AC3. Source: PAL native.

127 min, I'll give it 800 Mb
